hero.title: Full Stack Developer & AI Engineer
hero.subtitle: Jordanian developer based in Riyadh — blending AI & Data Science expertise with full-stack engineering to build precise, intelligent digital products.

about.title: About
about.intro1: I'm {name}, a Jordanian developer based in Riyadh. I studied Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, and have built expertise across the full stack — from React and React Native on the front end to Node.js, Express, and Python on the back end, with MongoDB and PostgreSQL powering the data layer.
about.intro2: I've worked extensively with AI technologies including RAG architectures and LangChain, and hold certifications in full-stack development. Whether it's a web app, a mobile experience, or an AI-powered system — I bring both the technical depth and the attention to craft.
about.philosophy: We can build great things together

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Open to new projects and collaborations
